ðŸ“– Summary: Khal is a command-line calendar application that allows users to manage and synchronize calendars. It stores events in the vdir format, enabling synchronization with CalDAV servers and other programs using vdirsyncer. The application provides a fast and easy way to add new events and browse/edit calendars through its interactive mode (ikhal).
